div.class: builder-panel editor-panel cf bg-color-blue fullwidth padding-top padding-bottom

strong.span: Announcement on School Closures & Remote Learning

div.p: Out of an abundance of caution and the necessity of keeping the safety of our scholars and staff as our top priority, our school closures across our regions are as follows right now:

Baton Rouge, LA | San Antonio, TX | Las Vegas, NV: Closed for the remainder of the school year
Camden, NJ: Closed until further notice
New York, NY: Closed until May 15
Remote Learning will be taking place during these closures. Please check your school’s website for up to date campus virtual learning information.

Stay safe,
Democracy Prep Public Schools

div.class: builder-panel editor-panel cf bg-color-white compact padding-top padding-bottom

div.p: Welcome to Democracy Prep Public Schools, a network of open-enrollment, high-performing, public charter schools operating in New York City, Camden, N.J., Baton Rouge, Las Vegas, and San Antonio.

The mission of Democracy Prep is to educate responsible citizen-scholars for success in the college of their choice and a life of active citizenship. A simple philosophy guides Democracy Prep staff, scholars, and alumni alike: Work Hard. Go to College. Change the World!

div.class: builder-panel editor-panel cf bg-color-yellow compact padding-top padding-bottom

div.h2: Applications in New York for the 2019-2020 school year are now open; enroll today!
div.p: Democracy Prep schools are schools of choice. We educate any child who is accepted through our random lottery, regardless of race, economic situation, special education status, nationality, previous academic record, or any other characteristic.

Democracy Prep New York Charter Schools will hold the lottery for the selection of new students in a remote meeting open to the public by phone and video conference on April 8th, 2020 at 2:00 pm., local time. A recording and transcript will be made available.

div.class: builder-panel editor-panel cf bg-color-white compact padding-top padding-bottom

div.h2: Programs that extend beyond basic academics.
div.p: At Democracy Prep, we are committed to ensuring that our scholars are well-rounded citizens and knowledgeable voters. Our arts and athletics programs ensure that is the case. Our scholars study the language and culture of South Korea to expand their own horizons. Democracy Prep Pathways is a program born from a desire to do more for students with severe learning challenges.

At Democracy Prep, we believe teaching matters most. In order to attract and retain the best educators, we provide highly competitive salary and benefits packages, including our new policy ensuring that new parents have 12 weeks of paid leave.

img.p: Sign up to receive the latest news & announcements.

div.div: © 2005-2020 Democracy Prep Public Schools | 1767 Park Avenue, 5th Floor New York, New York 10035
